item.title: ‘Futurama’ Cast, Producers Joke About Their Frequent Cancellations, Tease Upcoming Guests and Storylines
item.description: “Futurama” is heading back from the future. Exec producer David X. Cohen revealed that next year’s season finale will explore more of the backstory of Fry and his brother as kids. &#
